This is a device that generates a thick cloud of nanobots that protects its user against ranged Attacks.

{{css_skillbox |black| NANOSCREEN  | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}
{{requirements}}
* The user is the target of a '''[[BS Attack]]'''. 
{{effects}}
* A -3 BS MOD is imposed on BS Attack Rolls against the user, and a +3 MOD applies to the user's [[Saving Roll]]s against BS Attacks.
* '''Restriction:''' These MODs do not apply to BS Attacks with the [[Comms Attack]] Trait.
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{remember-start}}
This device cannot be used against '''[[CC Attack]]s'''.
{{remember-end}}
